scripts.build: cd ../ck-observable-domain && yarn tsc && echo 'ck-observable-domain built.' && cd ../ck-observable-domain-mqtt && yarn && yarn tsc && echo 'ck-observable-domain-mqtt built.'&& cd ../ck-observable-domain-signalr && yarn && yarn tsc && echo 'ck-observable-domain-signalr built.' && cd ../ck-observable-domain-demo && yarn && tsc --noEmit && parcel build --no-autoinstall && echo 'ck-observable-domain-demo built.'
